data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 33,685 lost people in  Nana-Grébizi, Central African Republic have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nana-Grébizi, Central African Republic
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Nana-Grébizi, Central African Republic and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.section_summary: On average, 11 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Nana-Grébizi, Central African Republic.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Nana-Grébizi.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Nana-Grébizi to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.

Jesus, I pray that all the Fulani, Bagirmi people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Fulani, Bagirmi people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Fulani, Bagirmi people is yours.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Nana-Grébizi, Central African Republic not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 37,789 believers in Nana-Grébizi that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Nana-Grébizi to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.
